name: AECoercePtrProcPtr
desc: Defines a pointer to a function that coerces data stored in a buffer. Your pointer coercion callback routine coerces the data from the passed buffer to the specified type, returning the coerced data in a descriptor.
declaration: typealias AECoercePtrProcPtr = (DescType, UnsafeRawPointer?, Size, DescType, SRefCon?, UnsafeMutablePointer<AEDesc>?) -> OSErr
